src_original: tatra tāvat /  kasya vijñānasya katame dharmā gocarā iti ?
katameṣāṃ pañcānām ?  sveṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ kāmāvacarasya duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyasya vijñānasyālambanam /  samudayadarśanaprahātavyasya sarvatragasaṃprayuktasya /
ekasya ca rūpāptasya bhāvanāprahātavyasya kuśalasyānāsravasya ceti /
rupāvacaro hi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo dharmaḥ aṣṭānāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam /
vicikitsāḥ catasraḥ /  dṛṣṭayo dvādaśa /  daśa paryavasthānāni /  ityetānyekacatvāriṃśad dravyāṇa kāmāsrava ityākhyāyate /  bhavāsravaḥ catuṣpañcāśad dravyāṇi /
rāgamānau viṃśatiḥ /  aṣṭau vicikitsāḥ /  caturviṃśati dṛṣṭayo 'vidyāṃ hitvā /  dve ca paryavasthāne styānauddhatyākhye,
apaharanti śleṣayanti ca (Jaini_299)  tathaivaikākinyo 'pi dṛṣṭaya iti /  tadevaṃ sati kāmaugha ekānnatriṃśat dravyāṇi /
rāgamānā viṃśatiḥ /  vicikitsā aṣṭau /  dṛṣṭyoghaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad dravyāṇi /  avidyaughaḥ pañcadaśadravyāṇi /
apratisaṃyuktāṃśca dvidhā kṛtvā saṃyuktaviprayuktabhedenaiva,  asaṃskṛtamapi dvidhākṛtvā kuśalāvyākṛtabhedenaivaṃ kṛtvā daśa bhavanti /
tatra tāvatsaṃvṛtijñānasya sarva eva daśadharmā viṣayaḥ /
